title: Ahead Of The CNN Democratic Debate, Bernie Sanders Has Taken The Conversation From Liberal Vs. ...
text: As we draw closer to the CNN Democratic debate, Bernie Sanders has skyrocketed from a hopeful candidate to one that has captivated the imagination of many around the United States. While Hillary Clinton remains the front-runner as we approach the first Democratic debate, Bernie Sanders has taken it upon himself to become the voice of...
